title.rendered: Hong Kong metro, SCL line, Hong Kong, China

content.rendered: Ten years after their first participation in the construction of the Hong Kong metro, VINCI Construction Grands Projets and Bachy Soletanche Group Limited are achieving a double technical feat in building the 12-kilometre SCL (Shatin to Central Link) line that connects the economic and commercial centre with the rest of the territory: construction of a 2.4-km tunnel by blasting and a 1.4-km twin bore tunnel by the 7.4-metre diameter Nu Wa earth pressure balanced shield tunnel boring machine, as well as associated shafts.

excerpt.rendered: A double feat to deliver two new tunnels for the Shatin to Central Link
